message: TESTING PLAN: Will test (1) concurrent spawns for race conditions, (2) deduplication checks, (3) resource cleanup on failures, (4) registry validation/repair, (5) triple load bug impact. Note: redundant_loads_optimizer reports triple load bug still exists at 2566/2590/2598 despite fixes.

CRITICAL FAILURE: Triple load bug NOT FIXED in deploy_headless_agent. Still loading registry 4 times at lines 2882, 2913, 2932, 2940. This NEGATES the benefit of fcntl locking by creating massive race condition window. Must refactor to single LockedRegistryFile context manager.

data.impact: Race condition window 4x larger than necessary
data.solution: Refactor to single load with LockedRegistryFile

message: GHOST ENTRIES PERSIST: Found 18 active agents in registry but only 17 tmux sessions. All 18 registry entries are ghosts (no matching tmux). Registry cleanup validation system implemented but ghost entries from previous runs remain. Need to run validate_and_repair_registry to clean them.

INTEGRATION TESTING COMPLETE: Comprehensive test suite executed (10 tests), detailed analysis provided. VERDICT: 70% complete (7/10 pass). Infrastructure implemented correctly (locking, atomic ops, deduplication, validation) BUT critical gap remains - deploy_headless_agent NOT REFACTORED to use infrastructure. Actionable next steps documented with code patches ready to apply.

critical_issues: Triple load bug at lines 2882/2913/2932/2940 - infrastructure not used
18 ghost entries persist - validation system not run yet
deliverables: output/ACTIONABLE_NEXT_STEPS.md - Step-by-step fix guide with code
data.recommendation: Deploy deployment_refactorer agent to fix triple load bug, then re-test
